title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.6 - Safe home network responsibilities/resident responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.6 - Safe home network responsibilities/resident responsibilities

State Regulations

In addition to the provisions set forth in section
452.9
(a)(9)
of
this Title, the written agreement entered into by the safe home network and the
resident must also contain: (a) the
rules of the safe home provider; (b) the requirement for residents to keep
confidential the name and address of the safe home provider and any other
residents and to disclose such information only to those persons authorized by
the network; (c) the requirement of
residents to be responsible for the supervision and management of their
children during their stay in a safe home; and
(d) the requirement for safe home networks to
have contact with each adult resident twice each week. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
454.6

Adopted

New

York State Register April 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 13, eff. 4/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
